title: Five Takeaways From the House G.O.P. Hearing With Former Twitter Executives
description: The Oversight Committee called the session to scrutinize whether the social media platform has censored the right, but it yielded new revelations about the company’s permissive approach.

title: Twitter Glitches Pile Up as Key Features Fail
description: Many users said they could not post tweets or message one another on Wednesday as the #TwitterDown hashtag began trending.

title: Microsoft’s ChatGPT-Powered Bing Makes Search Interesting Again
description: Google has stiff competition now, after Microsoft integrated powerful A.I. technology into its search engine.

title: Disinformation Researchers Raise Alarms About A.I. Chatbots
description: Researchers used ChatGPT to produce clean, convincing text that repeated conspiracy theories and misleading narratives.

title: Musk prometió quitar de Twitter las imágenes de abuso, ¿cumplió?
description: Las imágenes se difunden en la plataforma incluso después de notificar a la empresa: un video tuvo 120.000 vistas y hay demoras al atender reportes.

title: How to Prepare for a Lost, Stolen or Broken Smartphone
description: You may never have to deal with a missing device, but planning ahead with a few simple steps can make it easier if disaster strikes.

title: Does Your Home Have Backup Power? We Want to Hear From You.
description: Sales of generators and home batteries are up as people look to protect themselves from power outages, which are becoming more common.
